definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: dub., only pl. [[הַמִּנְהָרוֹת אֲשֶׁר]] [[בֶּהָרִים]] Ju Jdg 6:2 (+ [[הַמְּעָרוֹת]] caves, [[הַמְּחָדוֹת]] strong-hold)—(clearly, si vera l., fr. a check [[נהר]], but with what meaning? Schultens:Job 49 comp. Ar. minharah;un, minharun [which means a place hollowed out by water], and rend. crevices, ravines, so Thes al.; Rashi Ki Wetzst:Hauran, 46 think of caves with a light-opening; R. Levi ben Gerson beacons, i.e. towers for fire-signals, GFM; but II. [[נהר]] late in Heb.; LXX trumali/av, Vulgate antra; Bu thinks [[הַמְּעָרוֹת]] a gloss explaining ´[[הַמִּנ]]).
